Articles.Content:
Just what this forum needs. Some positivity.

 

Built my first interplanetary rocket and when I entered Dunas atmosphere? My word. A re entry has never felt so... Legendary! This is the music KSP deserves! OK, not all the music is this grand, but it's definitely leaps and bounds beyond KSP1. Do all the planets have unique music? I aim to find out.

Just descending into Eve now. Gorgeous viola (I think-sounds too low for violin).

A real orchestra played by real musicians makes a heap of difference.

Edited February 26, 2023 by Klapaucius
I've been fairly critical, but the music is on point as is most of the sound (excepting decoupling, that needs a proper sound).
The music is pretty good honestly, I like how it flows with each other so smoothly! Still, I have nostalgia for KSP1's music so I'll say that I prefer it over KSP2 but it isn't too bad honestly
